original_title: What's in the Bible? Volume 4: Battle for the Promised Land
overview: "Battle for the Promised Land" contains two 25-minute episodes.  Episode 1: "Finally, the Promised Land!" covers Joshua and tricky questions about fighting and killing in the Bible. Episode 2: "Cycle of Misery" covers the time of the Judges and the Bible’s romance story – Ruth!
title: What's in the Bible? Volume 4: Battle for the Promised Land
